Eco Impact Tracker

- Single-file HTML app with inline CSS and JS (no external dependencies).
- **Core purpose**: Track personal daily carbon footprint from transport, energy, food, waste; visualize weekly impact and suggest reductions.
- **Data persistence**: Use localStorage to save entries (date, category, amount, notes) across sessions; auto-load last 7 days on startup.
- **Main UI**: Responsive grid layout (CSS Grid) adapts to mobile/desktop; sections for input form, impact summary card, historical grid, tips panel.
- **Input form**: Dropdown for category (Transport: km driven/flown; Energy: kWh used; Food: meals type; Waste: kg); numeric input with validation; date picker (default today); Add button appends to list.
- **Calculations**: Fixed emission factors (e.g., car 0.2kgCO2/km, electricity 0.4kgCO2/kWh, meat meal 5kgCO2); sum daily/weekly totals in kgCO2e; show vs average (global avg 15kg/day).
- **Visualization**: Bar chart (Canvas API) for weekly totals per category; color-coded impact levels (green <10kg/day, yellow 10-20, red >20).
- **Theme system**: Auto-detect prefers-color-scheme (dark/light); toggle switch; dark mode uses earthy tones (forest green #228B22, slate gray).
- **Tips panel**: Dynamic suggestions based on highest category (e.g., "Switch to biking: save 0.2kg/km"); 5-10 pre-defined tips with eco icons (SVG).
- **Navigation**: Fixed top nav bar (Home: dashboard; Track: form focus; History: scroll to grid; Print: trigger window.print()).
- **Print-friendly**: @media print hides nav/toggles, optimizes grid for A4 (single column, black text, no charts).
- **Accessibility**: ARIA labels on inputs/charts; keyboard nav (Tab to form, Enter to add, Arrow keys for history); high contrast mode; screen-reader friendly summaries (e.g., "Total this week: 85kg CO2").
- **Responsive breakpoints**: Mobile <600px (stacked cards); Tablet 600-1024px (2-col grid); Desktop >1024px (3-col + sidebar).
- **Interactions**: Smooth animations (CSS transitions); confirm delete entries; export CSV button (downloads generated text file).
- **Edge cases**: Handle no data (welcome message); validate inputs (positive numbers only); offline-first (all client-side).
- **Performance**: <800 LOC total; lazy chart render on scroll; no heavy loops.
- **Testable features**: Add 3 days data → verify totals/chart; toggle theme → persists; print → clean output; resize → reflows grid.
